::Slayer::

Slayer studies the equipment that was still needed, listening to 
Ignatius.

"Hmm," he replies to the idea, "I guess I can do that as well as any 
other bot, but how would we lure them?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius studies the data and crossreferences with the cargo bays. 
most of
> the equipment already existed but there were still a few items 
remaining. he
> uplinked the references back to the computer so he and Slayer 
could  start
> gathering the equipment. Theyd have to find a way to capture the 
rest. "I
> may have an idea" the eagle bot states, "You think you could lure 
some
> maximals back into the mountains where I recovered you?"
